arts.ttl: The lowdown on Blackpool 2 Charlton Athletic 2 - Addicks miss chance to climb into top six as they throw two-goal lead away
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic: Maynard-Brewer, Ramsay, Gillesphey, Jones, Coventry (Leaburn 89), Berry (Anderson 70), Docherty, Edwards, Small, Campbell (Aneke 62), Godden (Kanu 62). Charlton let a two-goal lead slip at Bloomfield Road and missed out on the chance to ascend into the play-off places.

arts.ttl: Blackpool come from two goals down to deny Charlton
arts.sum: Goals from Sammy Silvera and Niall Ennis earned the hosts a point.

arts.ttl: Thierry Small makes Charlton Athletic contract future admission
arts.sum: “It’s a bit easier to play on the right when I’m attacking. “It’s been good for me in terms of learning a different role,” said Small.

Blackpool might start the weekend in the bottom half but are one of four teams stuck on 37 points and might still fancy a late playoff push. The Seasiders are six unbeaten and have only lost once - a...

arts.ttl: Preview: Blackpool vs. Charlton Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Blackpool and Charlton Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
